title: Arrival in Amsterdam
summary: Xiao Fang arrives in Amsterdam with no money or connections, determined to start a new life despite her hardships.

title: Fortune by Chance
summary: Through a series of lucky encounters, Xiao Fang unexpectedly finds small amounts of money, allowing her to survive and gain hope.

title: The Spark of an Idea
summary: Inspired by her unique luck and circumstances, Xiao Fang conceives the concept of an assassin organization that targets the spirit instead of the body.

title: Recruiting the Elites
summary: Xiao Fang seeks out and recruits talented individuals who share her vision, forming the core team of her new organization.

title: The First Operation
summary: The organization launches its inaugural mission, tormenting the spiritual world of a powerful figure and orchestrating their replacement.

title: A Growing Influence
summary: As more operations succeed, Xiao Fang's group begins to gain notoriety and influence within Amsterdam's underworld.

title: Resistance and Challenge
summary: Rival factions and suspicious authorities start to take notice, presenting obstacles to Xiao Fangâ€™s ambitions.

title: Consolidation of Power
summary: Xiao Fang and her team overcome threats, cementing their control and replacing key positions in Amsterdam with their own elites.

title: The Rule of Xiao Fang
summary: With Amsterdam under her influence, Xiao Fang reflects on her journey and the transformation of the city under her unique reign.
